8081c408-97f7-5cff-a796-084dca37302e.title: Cracks to be determined either as active or inactive.

bc21faa4-fee5-5951-a3d2-0bd2c83b8977.title: >0.2mm - shall be repaired via Resin Injection, Routing and Sealing or Gravity Feed method.

e69f656b-9478-55e7-a7e3-e46aee602111.title: Acceptance Criteria: Crack repair procedure should be submitted prior to repairs being undertaken and must be approved by the Superintendent. 2e20025f-952c-5ff8-bd09-2fdc58c60e9b.title: Record of Conformity: Document evidence of adequate experience

58fa7620-e708-5d09-b44a-cbe277e4f39d.title: Acceptance Criteria: Personnel undertaking the concrete repair works shall have a minimum of 5 years experience in application. Documented evidence to be available.

efea2e36-a682-5f62-b487-05001163eb98.title: Frequency: Once, for each personnel, prior to starting Works

5c904655-f588-53b6-955a-b9f671329415.title: Reference Documents: VicRoads Spec. Cl.687.06 (a) CI.687.09 (c) (iii)

a45d45a9-7a0f-5446-a80c-9aa3c18997ff.title: Note: This ITP does not cover special purpose, multi-component injection pumps.

8f90973b-c2e9-5127-a242-b2071f9f924c.title: Acceptance Criteria: Injection equipment to be simple, easy to handle guns with pressure regulation or limitations in the operating range and be simple to clean and maintain.

70aea461-95a0-52db-8986-8b44ee7dbb36.title: Frequency: Once, prior to starting the Works

0f7dcfc3-5263-5269-b25e-a3716f20110f.title: Nipples/entry ports to have shut off valves or at least the ability to be capped to prevent leaks or air travelling back into the crack. Resin adhesive injection shall be performed continuously until cracks are completely filled. If port to port travel of resin adhesive is not indicated, the work shall cease immediately and the Superintendent notified.

ebe1890c-c78d-5c4a-9211-01279dc05cc7.title: Acceptance Criteria: Repairs are not to be undertaken when the ambient temperature is below 5°C or 5°C on a falling thermometer, or above 35°C.

97f14dc2-ff43-521f-9955-85ef7f264d61.title: Where re-injection is required, this shall be carried out within the temperature-dependent period of the crack filling material given in the directions for use by the manufacturer. At high ambient temperatures, the use of cooling to influence the workability time of materials in containers is permissible.

9b13c3d2-0622-5ce6-b3e0-69b83a7285b5.title: Reference Documents: VicRoads Spec. Cl.687.05 CI.687.09 (c) (i)

84642e93-6278-58ce-b4f9-5d03b336a737.title: Cooling the materials is allowed should the need arise if temperatures inadvertently rise during the repairs.

cde61e5e-74ea-5ef8-8bff-67d5bf2a83fd.title: Acceptance Criteria: Cracks and surfaces located within 50mm each side of the crack to be cleaned of all loose particles, dirt, dust, curing compounds, grease or efflorescence by appropriate means (i.e. oil-free compressed air, industrial vacuum cleaners or flushing with high pressure water). Impurities, which inhibit wetting and adhesion or penetration by the crack filling material, shall be removed.

f36aa49f-0e8a-58bb-9187-e388a5a5bcf7.title: Where cracks and surrounding areas have been moistened during the cleaning process, sufficient time or accelerated drying-out needs to occur unless the crack repair materials are water tolerant

650e10c8-c08e-5aae-aefc-70ab487346c7.title: vii. Stop pressure and close the valve of the engaged nipple/entry port and connect to the nipple/entry port where the resin appeared, working either upwards (for vertical cracks) or along the crack (for horizontal cracks) until all nipples/entry ports have been filled;

b164f370-cf6b-5a76-9f36-d8a0e0b3c9ac.title: iix. Repair to be protected from damage or adverse weather while curing;

d51822e9-725f-5d3f-8926-6aec90d4aefb.title: 2 no. cores for the first 25m of crack and an additional 1 no. core sample for each 50m of crack or part thereof.

5eb52db9-617a-5637-8aeb-52069e8a59fc.title: Acceptance Criteria: After 7 days minimum, 75mmØ core samples shall be taken to verify cracks are fully sealed.

12835d1d-fde3-511e-930e-4358cd7b777b.title: Cores to be located in conjunction with a covermeter to avoid reinforcement and approved by the Nominated Authority.
